\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidha}

\meaning{\artha{mUru bage; mUru parxkAra:} \ullekha{sAhitayx\-dalilx bahuvAgi baLasiruva I padakekx saMdaBARnu\-sAravAgi aneVka bageya visheVSAthaRgaLu barutatxve. avugaLalilx kelavanunx ililx koDalAgide.}
\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx guruvanolisabeVku manava koTuTx liMgavanolisabeVku dhanava koTuTx jaMgamavanolisabeVku I tirxvidhava ho{\ra}gu mADi ha{\ro}ya hoyisi ku{\ru}ha pUjisuva goravara mecacx (savasaM. 1; basava. 206-52).}
\artha{liMga, jaMgama, parxsAda:}
\ullekha{liMgadalilx kaThiNavuMTe jaMgamadalilx kulavuMTe parxsAdadalilx aruciyuMTe I tirxvidha\-dalilx BAvaBeVdavana{\ra}suvenu (savasaM. 1; basava. 286-70); liMga baMdu manavaniMbugoMbudu, jaMgama baMdu dhanavaniMbu\-goMbudu, parxsAda baMdu tanuvaniMbugoMbudu [I] tirx\-vidhavu tAne ...niVnolida sharaNaMge daqSaTx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 58-19).}
\artha{tanu, mana, dhana:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx tanu baya\-lAyitutx manava koTuTx mana bayalAyitutx dhanava koTuTx dhana bayalAyitutx. I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx kUDalacenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayala samAdhi\-yAyitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1297-457).}
\artha{shudadhx, sidadhx, parxsidadhx parxsAdagaLu:}
\ullekha{shudadhx\-parxsAda guruvinadu sidadhxparxsAda liMgadadu parxsidadhxparxsAda jaMgama\-dadu iMtiV tirxvidha oMdAdavara toV{\rA} (savasaM. 1; basava. 791-201).}
\artha{utapxtitx, sithxti, layagaLeMba mUru avasethxgaLu:}
\ullekha{mUjagadalilx ni[ru]taru kUDalasaMgana sharaNaru tirxvidha\-vana{\ri}yaru (savasaM. 1; basava. 902-235).}
\artha{manasathxla, tanusathxla, karasathxla:}
\ullekha{hara... gururUpAgi baMdu manasathxlakekx maMtarxvAda tanusathxlakekx parxsAdavAda karasathxlakekx liMgavAda iMtiV tirxvidhadalilx sAhitayxvAdanayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 22-10).}
\artha{tanushudadhx, manaHshudadhx, BAvashudadhx eMba mUru bageya shudadhxjiVvaru:}
\ullekha{tanushudadhxnAgi iSaTxliMgava pUjisabeVku mana\-shudadhxnAgi pArxNaliMgada dhAyxnisa\-beVku BAvashudadhxnAgi BAvaliMgava BAvisabeVku iMtiV tirxvidha\-vana{\ri}yade... Anu shudadhxnAde\-neMba kirxyAdevxYtiyAda pAtakana nAyaka narakadalilxkukxva (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 939-298).}
\artha{kamaR\-kAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxna\-kAMDa eMba mUru parxkAragaLu:}
\ullekha{kamaRkAMDa Bakitx\-kAMDa jAcnxnakAMDa I tirxvidhadalilx vaMcakanAdaDe Isu vidha\-doLage aMga\-vilalx (savasaM. 1; basava. 889-232).}

\artha{acacxparxsAdi, nicacxparxsAdi, samaya parxsAdigeLeMba mUvaru parxsAdigaLu.}
\artha{AdhAyxtimxka, AdhiBwtika, AdhideYvikaveMba mUru bageya kaSaTxgaLu.}

\begin{entry}

\ullekha{``liMgapiVThagaLu samavAgi paMcasUtarx parxmANavu AgamoVkatxdaMte shudadhxvAdare AyureYshavxyaRgaLuMTAguvuvu... liMgavaM baLasida sUtarx parxmANaveV 1. liMgapiVThavaM aLeyuvudu, 2. liMgoVnanxta piVThaparxmANa, 3. goVmuKada agarxliMga masatxkaparxmANa, 4. adaradhaRveV goVmuKavu, 5. -hiVge paMca\-sUtarxgaLu shivAgamadathaRvu" (viVsheYpu. 7neya kAMDa, tAtapxyaR\-caMdirxke. puTa 30); iMtu paMcasUtarxmuLaLx piVTha\-liMgadoLeMdeV jAtishilAdigaLAda kAMtimayavapapx liMgasathxlamaM tiVthARMbu paMcagavayx Basita mishorxVdakaMgaLiM paripUtamAda tirxvidha kuMBadoLf... avagAhamirisi (viveVka. 101); A paMcasUtarxda vidhAnaveMtene mahAshirxV paramaliMgamaM baLasidaR sUtarxveV tA pavaNadoMdu sUtarxM liMgapiVThavaLeyalekxraDu liMgoVnanxtaM A piVThadeDeyoLeV mU{\ru} goVmuKadagarx Opa liMgada masatxkakekx nAlakxda{\ra}dhaRveV parikisalekx goVmuKaviMtu paMcasUtarxM shivAgamadathaRveY (viVsheYpu. 7-105-47). ``shivaliMgagaLa parxtiSAThxkAladalilx gamanisuva liMgoVcacxte, liMga\-visAtxra, liMgaswthxlayx, piVThavisAtxra, parxnAlikAmAnagaLeMba aidu sUtarxgaLu" (kananxni. 5-5047)}; \artha{diVkASxvidhi muMtAda maMgaLakAyaRgaLigAgi sAthxpisuva paMcakalashagaLalilxya gurukalashakekx, maMtarxdhAyxnasahitavAgi uragabaMdhadaMte saMbaMdhisuva aidu eLegaLu.} \ullekha{saMcadoVvariyoLage paMcasUtarxvu miMci kaMcumiMcina saMcalana nuMgitu paMcasUtarxvu miMci saMcadoVvarigoMDu paMcamuKa paramaguruvAda sharaNa (padagoV. {\rm v-}2); I maMtarxdiMda gurukalashakekx paMcasUtarxMgaLanikikx paMcapalalxvaMgaLanikikx paMcamuKaMgaLanikikx gurukalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (gaNaBA. 189-21).}}

\artha{jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx matutx paramAtamx eMba AtamxtarxyagaLalilx oMdu; aMtArAtamxnigiMta ucacxsAthxnavanunx paDediruva paramAtamxnu kAraNashariVriyAgi, liMgasathxtiyanunx paDedanaMtara shariVrada savARMgagaLalilxyU ceYtanayxvanunxMTumADutAtxne. kAraNashariVradoMdige saMbaMdhisida BAvaliMgavu parxkaTagoMDu Atamxnu shivanalilx suSupitxyalilx hoMdutAtxne.}
\ullekha{jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamxreMdAtamxtarxyaMgaLavaralilx ...loVkavayxvahArakekx sUyaRneMtaMte jiVvAMtarAtamxra vayxvahArasAkiSxkaneV paramAtamxnapapxM (viveVka. 25); AtamxM\break mU{\ru}BeVdaM ...jiVvAtamxnaMtarAtamxM baLika paramAtamxM ...tatapxrX\-paMcadoLf barade silakxde nirAkArarUpinoLihaM paramAtamxM (cebapu. 58-31).}
\artha{EkoVtatxra jaMgamaliMgasathxladalilxruva olavuliMgada mUru sathxlagaLalilx oMdu; viveVkasavxrUpiyAda pArxNaliMgiyanunx paramAtamxnu Avarisuva sathxla.} \ullekha{olavu liMgatirxvidha jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamx. (savasaM. 3'; cenanxba. 849-255).} 
\artha{Atamxna vikAsakakxnusAravAgi uMTAguva jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx, nimaRlAtamx, shudAdhxtamx, \hbox{jAcnxnAtamx}, mahAtamx, divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMba oMbatutx avasethxgaLalilx oMdu.}
\ullekha{vikAsa hoMdida hAge Atamxnu anukarxma\-vAgi jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx ...divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMdu heVLalapxDutatxve (shivAkoV. 39-38).}
\artha{mUvatAtxru bageya tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu.}
\ullekha{CatitxVsatatatxvXdoLu rAjisututxviRyoLagaNuvigaNuvA mahatitxge mahatitxVvaRrilelxnisuvadavxyarUpaniravanAM baNiNxsuvoDaLave ...enanx mana oMdipupxdipapxtatx A{\ro}nisuvaMtarAtamxnoLalA ipapxtatxELaneya paramAtamxnoLu nimamx mana\-vipupxdayayx (viVsheYpu. 3-38-34).}}

\ullekha{urutara rahasayxdoLagoVMkAraveV kaNA parashivaM baLikA yakArave sadAshivaM ...nakAraM keVLu taruNiyA barxhamxnivanA saqSiTxyirada{\ri}va para\-viloVmaM (viVsheYpu. 1-5-55); SaTasxthXlabarxhamxmUtiRgaLu -oMdoMdu sAdAKayxkekx obobxbabx adhideVvategaLirutAtxre. parashivana savxrUpagaLeV ivaru eMdu heVLabahudu... 1. parashiva athavA sharaNa athavA jaMgama athavA Atamx 2. sadAshiva, 3. shiva, 4. rudarx, 5. viSuNx, 6. barxhamx (shivAkoV. 21-25).}

\ullekha{barxhamxvana{\ri}ta matetx sumamxne irabeVku barxhamxparxsaMgava mADuvalilx parabarxhimxgaLalilx parxsaMgava mADabeVku (savasaM. 6; a{\ri}mA. 484-151).}

\newmeaning{\artha{BUmiya vikArasavxrUpadiMda sAvxyaMBuvaliMga, biMduliMga, parxtiSiThxtaliMga, caraliMga, guruliMga eMdu aidu vidha. tAnAgiyeV udaBxvavAdaliMga sAvxyaMBuva, biMdu-nAdagaLiMda kUDidudu biMduliMga, mahAtamxru matutx shAsatxrXjacnxriMda maMtorxVcAcxradiMda sAthxpisidudx parxtiSiThxtaliMga, soMTa modalAda shariVrada nAnA BAgagaLalilx dharisuva nAnA ratanx, loVha, shile, maNuNx modalAdavugaLiMda nimARNavAda liMga caraliMga, vishavxsatxru matutx shiSayxrugaLige gurushariVraveV guruliMga.}}

AcAraliMgavu Bakatxsathxla, guruliMgavu mAheVshavxrasathxla, shivaliMgavu parxsAdisathxla, caraliMgavu pArxNaliMgisathxla, parxsAdaliMgavu sharaNasathxla matutx mahAliMgavu aikayxsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive.}}

\newmeaning{\artha{sithxra, cara, sithxracara, carasithxra, sithxrasithxra, caracara eMdu liMgavu Aru vidha. (lakaSxNagaLanunx Adharisida BeVda).}}

\begin{shl}

sithxrasithxraM caracaraM SaDivxdhaM liMgalakaSxNamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 16. 9)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{AyA padagaLu}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu liMgavu mUru vidha. ivu talA matetx mUru mUru vidhavAgi oTuTx oMbatutx vidhavAgutatxve. ELu-eMTu-oMbatutx aMgulagaLa liMgavu utatxma; nAlukx-aidu-Aru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{madhayxma}; oMdu-eraDu-mUru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{adhama} enisutatxve. niVrina meVlina guLeLxya AkAradudx utatxmaliMga; koVLimoTeTxya AkAradudx madhayxma; hasuvina hegalina AkAradudx madhayxmaliMga (AkArada AdhAradiMda uMTAda BeVda). oMdu, eraDu, mUru, nAlukx, aidu, Aru, ELu, eMTu, oMbatutx aMgula gAtarxda oMbatutx liMgagaLu.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmaM madhayxmaM niVcamiti liMgaM tirxdhoVcayxteV |\\
ESevxVkeVna tirxdhA tadavxdukatxmaMgulamAnataH ||\\
navASaTxsapAtxMgulakaM liMgaM sherxVSaThx tathA samxqqtamf |\\
SaDfpaMcakacatumARnaM madhayxmaM tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
tirxdevxyXVkAMgulamAniVyaM tirxvidhaM tasayx saMsakxqqtamf |\\
EvaM navavidhaM porxVkatxM yathA karxmAtf ||\\
utatxmaM budubxdhAkAraM madhayxmaM kukukxTAMDavatf |\\
adhamaM goVkakutf parxKayxmiti liMgaM tirxdhA samxqqtamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 4. 52-55)}
\newmeaning{\artha{aKaMDaliMga, BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga, paqthivxVrUpada AcAraliMga, jalarUpada guruliMga, teVjoVrUpada shivaliMga, vAyurUpada caraliMga, AkAshamayavAda parxsAdaliMga, AtamxtatatxvXrUpada mahA\-liMga-eMdu hatutx vidha liMgagaLu.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
iSaTxliMgaparxkaqtikaM AcAraguruliMgakeV |\\
pAthiRvApeyxV iti porxVketxV sheYvAgamavishAradeYH ||\\
pArxNaliMgaparxkaqtikeV teVjoVvAyumayeV tathA |\\
shivaliMgacarABiKeyxV liMgeV devxV varavaNiRni ||\\
voyxVmaparxkaqtikaM liMgaM pArxsAdAKayxM mahatatxramf |\\
AtamxtatatxvXmayaM porxVkatxM mahAliMgaM mahatatxramf ||\\
iti sidAdhxMtasheVKaravacaneVnoVkAtxnAM dashavidhaliMgAnAmf...
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\artha{BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga eMdu liMgasathxlavu mUru vidha. I mUru liMgagaLu matetx talA eraDera\-DAgutatxve. BAvaliMgavu mahAliMga, parxsAdaliMga eMdU, pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMga eMdU, iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMgaveMdU talA eraDeraDAgi oTuTx Aru liMgasathxlagaLAgutatxve.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgasathxlaM tirxdhA jecnxVyaM tadeBxVdoV vaNayxRteV karxmAtf ||\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM sAyxdf divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVtatf tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
EkameVkaM sathxlaM BUyoV divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxM liMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
BAvaliMgaM BavateyxVva sAvxnuBUtiparxmANataH ||\\
tathA ca caraliMgaM ca shivaliMgamiti davxyamf |\\
pArxNaliMgaM BavateyxVva tAtapxyARthoRV na saMshayaH ||\\
guruliMgaM tathA{\char'263\char'263}cAraliMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
iSaTxliMgaM BavateyxVva satayxmukatxmidaM mayA ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxliMgaM ca caraliMgakamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 3. 16-21)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\newmeaning{\artha{liMgAMgasAmarasayxdalilx aneVka parxBeVdagaLive. muKayxvAgi sAdhanasahita matutx sAdhanarahita eMdu eraDu vidha. veVdhA, manu (maMtarx), kirxyA eMba mUru diVkeSxgaLiMda uMTAguva sAdhanegaLiMda sAdhisuvaMtahadudx sAdhanasahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx. shirxVguruvina upadeVshavanunx pAlisuvudariMda uMTAguvudu sAdhanarahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx enisive.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAMgasAmarasayxsayx parxkArAH bahavoV mayA ||\\
daharoVpAsanAdhAyxyeV saMvagoRVpAsanAdayaH |\\
sahitAH sAdhaneVneYteV rahitAH sAdhaneYsatxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 9-10)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAMgayoVH sAmarasayxM jiVvabarxhemxYkayxlakaSxNamf ||\\
tadapi divxvidhaM porxVkatxM sAdhaneVna samanivxtamf |\\
divxtiVyaM tadivxnimuRkatxmAdayxM gurukaqtaM parA ||\\
divxtiVyamapi shiSayxsayx guruvAkayxsayx pAlanAtf |\\
AdayxM veVdhAdidiVkASxBAyxsitxrXpuMDarxsAyxpi dhAraNAtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nitayxliMgAcaRne, kAmayxliMgAcaRne eMdu liMgAcaRneyu eraDu vidha. iSATxthaRvanunx pUreYsuvudu kAmayxliMgAcaRne, pApanAshakavAdadudx nitayxliMgAcaRne.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAcaRnaM tu divxvidhaM nitayxkAmayxviBeVdataH |\\
tatheYva haradatAtxyeRYrukatxM tAtapxyaRsaMgarxheV ||\\
devxVdhA tavAcaRnavidhisatxruNeVMdumwleV |\\
kAmAyakashicxdaparoV duritakaSxyAya |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(paM. ca., 1. 5-6)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgapUjeyu mahatiV, guviRV, laGivxV, avasarA eMdu nAlukx vidha. mahatiV pUjeyanunx utatxmanu (SaTf\-kAlagaLalilx pUjemADuvavanu), guviRVpUjeyanunx madhayxmanu (tirxkAla pUjemADuvavanu), ashakatxnu pArxtaHkAla muMtAda samayadalilx BoVjana samayadalilx avasarA pUjeyanunx mADabeVku. }}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmoV mahatiVM kuyARdf guviRVM madhayxma Eva ca |\\
laGivxVmashakatxH kuyARcacx sAyaM mAdhAyxhanxkeV tathA ||\\
avasarA BoVjaneV porxVkAtx pArxtarAdiSu suvarxteV |\\
tirxkAlamacaRnAM kuyARcaCxkatxH SaTfkAlameVva vA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kA. A., kirx. pA., 4. 5-6; makuTa., kirx. pA., 3. 3-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{mahatiVpUjA, guviRVpUjA, laGivxVpUjA, avasarApUjA}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna, samAna eMdu parxdhAna\-vAgi aidu BeVda. raMBa eMbudu Araneyadu. ivu karxma\-vAgi AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, caraliMga, parxsAda\-liMga, mahAliMgada rUpagaLu. nAga, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVvadatatx, dhanaMjaya, satxMBa eMdu Aru upavAyugaLu. I upavAyugaLu karxmavAgi Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNa\-liMgi, sharaNa, aikayx eMba SaTfsathxlarUpagaLu.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vAyavaH-pArxNaH apAnaH vAyxnaH udAnaH samAnaH raMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahAliMgarUpAH |...\\
upavAyavaH-nAgaH kUmaRH kaqkaraH deVvadatatxH dhanaMjayaH satxMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH BakatxmAheVshavxraparxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNeYkayxrUpAH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shurx. sA., 16, pu. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sAmAnayx, visheVSa, nirABAriV eMdu viVrasheYvavu mUru vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
punaH tirxvidhameVtadidhx sAmAnAyxdiBeVdataH |\\
sAmAnayxshacx visheVSashacx nirABAriVti ca tirxdhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 35; sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 30)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{sAmAnayxviVrasheYva, visheVSa viVrasheYva, nirABAriV viVrasheYva}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shwrxtaviVrasheYva, savxtaMtarxviVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha. vaNARsharxma dhamaRda AcaraNeyiMda saMpananxvAdudu shwrxtaviVrasheYva. vaNARsharxmadhamaRda AcaraNeyilalxdudx savxtaMtarx viVrasheYva.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
viVrasheYvaM parxvakASxyXmi viditaM shurxtitaMtarxyoVH |\\
shwrxtaM savxtaMtarxmiti ca divxvidhaM parikiVtiRtamf ||\\
vaNARsharxmiVyadhamARDhayxM shwrxtamitayxBidhiVyateV |\\
tadiVyadhamaRrahitaM savxtaMtarxmiti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 30-31)}
\newmeaning{\artha{pUvaRshAMBaviV, utatxrashAMBaviV eMdu I muderxyu eraDu vidha. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTxyiMdalU, nAdAnu saMdhAnavanunx mADuva manasisxnoMdige kUDuva muderx pUvaRshAMBaviV eMdenisutatxde. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTx matutx manasusx nAdabarxhamxdalilx muLugidare utatxrashAMBaviV muderx eMdenisutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., pu. 146)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
nAsAgarxdatatxnimiSoVnimxSabAhayxdaqSATxyX\\
lakeSxyXV sadAshivavimashaRkagUDhadaqSATxyX |\\
joyxVtiH savxrUpamacalaM haqdi bAhayxhiVnaM\\
pashayxMti yeV ta iha saMyaminaH kaqtAthARH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 5. 7)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shivajAcnxna, shivaBakitx, shivadhAyxna, shivavarxta, shivapUje eMdu shivayoVgavu aidu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
jAcnxnaM shivamayaM BakitxH sheYviV dhAyxnaM shivAtamxkamf |\\
sheYvavarxtaM shivAceRVti shivayoVgoV hi paMcadhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 1. 15)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{yoVga}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{vaMshayxshiSayx, AgaMtukashiSayx eMdu eraDu vidha. vaMshayxshiSayxnu matetx muKayx matutx sAmAnayx eMdu eraDu vidha. muKayx shiSayxnu barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx eMdu eraDu vidha. barxhamxcAriyu paTATxdhikAri carapati, nirABAri eMdu mUru vidha. beVre vaMshadalilx janisida shiSayxnu AgaMtuka shiSayx eMdenisutAtxne.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vaMshayx AgaMtukashecxVti divxvidhaH shiSayx ucayxteV |\\
muKayxH sAmAnayxH iteyxVvaM punavaRMshoyxV divxdhA mataH ||\\
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceVti divxdhA muKoyxV viBidayxteV |\\
ukatxlakaSxNasaMpanonxV barxhamxcAriV punasitxrXdhA ||\\
paTATxBiSeVkavAnAdayxH yaH porxVkatxshacxrapatisatxthA |\\
nirABArasatxqqtiVyaH sAyxtf savaRloVkeVSu vishurxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AcAra BeVdadiMda sheYvavu aneVka vidhavAgutatxde. AyA AcAragaLanunx parxtipAdisuva matavu AyA sheYvanAmagaLiMda kareyalapxDutatxve. sheYvavu eraDu vidha-(a) sheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM ca viVrasheYvaM ca divxvidhaM sheYvamiVritamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 8. 2)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(A) shwrxtasheYva, ashwrxtasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM tu divxvidhaM porxVkatxM shwrxtamashwrxtameVva ca |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 2. 23)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(i) nAlukx vidha-sAmAnayxsheYva, misharxsheYva, shudadhxsheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu nAlukx vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sAmAnayxsheYvaM parxthamaM misharxsheYvaM tataH paramf ||\\
shudadhxsheYvaM tathA jecnxVyaM viVrasheYvaM tataH paramf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(vA. shu. A., 10. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(I) aidu vidha-shudadhxsheYva, misharxsheYva, mAgaRsheYva, viVrasheYva, avAMtara sheYva eMdu aidu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shudadhxsheYvaM misharxsheYvaM mAgaRsheYvaM taqtiVyakamf |\\
catuthaRM viVrasheYvaM ca paMcamoV{\char'263}vAMtarasatxthA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 17. 4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(u) ELu vidha-(a) anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, mahAsheYva, anusheYva, avAMtarasheYva, parxvarasheYva, aMtayxsheYva eMdu ELu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvAH sapatxvidhA jecnxVyAsetxVSAM BeVdAnf shaqNu karxmAtf |\\
anAdisheYvaH parxthamamAdisheYvasatxtaH paramf ||\\
mahAsheYvasatxtoV jecnxVyasatxvXnusheYvasatxtaH paramf |\\
avAMtarasatxtoV jecnxVyaH parxvarasatxdanaMtaramf ||\\
aMtayxsheYvasatxtoV jecnxVyaH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 4-6)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{viVrasheYva, anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, anusheYva, mahAsheYva, yoVga\-sheYva, jAcnxnasheYva eMdu ELu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM sapatxvidhaM puNayxM viVrasheYvAdi BeVdataH |\\
viVrasheYvaM tathAnAdisheYvamAdiparaM tataH ||\\
anusheYvaM mahAsheYvaM yoVgasheYvaM tu SaSaThxkamf |\\
sapatxmaM jAcnxnasheYvAKayxM... ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 1. 15, 17)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(U) eMTu vidha-anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, pUvaRsheYva, misharxsheYva, shudadhxsheYva, sAmAnayxsheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu eMTu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
adhunA teV parxvakASxyXmi sheYvaBeVdamanutatxmamf |\\
anAdisheYvaM parxthamamAdisheYvaM divxtiVyakamf ||\\
pUvaRsheYvaM taqtiVyaM sAyxtf misharxsheYvaM catuthaRkamf |\\
shudadhxsheYvaM paMcamaM sAyxtf SaSaTxM veY mAgaRsheYvakamf ||\\
sAmAnayxM sapatxmaM jecnxVyaM viVrasheYvamathASaTxmamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 4-5)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(Qu) hadineYdu vidha-AdisheYva, mahAsheYva, anusheYva, avAMtarasheYva, aMtayxsheYva, parxvarasheYva, sheYva, pAshupata, soVma, dakiSxNa, kAlAmuKa, lAkula, pUvaRsheYva, mAgaRsheYva, shudadhxsheYva eMdu hadineYdu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AdisheYva mahAsheYvAdi SaTfsheYvAni BUyoV{\char'263}pi sheYvAH pAshupatA ituyxkAtxni sheYvAni SaTf pUvaRsheYvamAgaRsheYvashudadhxsheYvamiti sheYvatarxyamf EvaM paMcadashavidhAni sheYvAni |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. viV. sA. saM., BA-1, pu. 11)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ApeVkiSxka matutx anApeVkiSxka eMdu satayxvu eraDu vidha. maNuNx modalAdavugaLa savxrUpa ApeVkiSxka satayx, EkeMdare parxLayakAladalilx adara aBAvaviruvudeV Agide. barxhamxsavxrUpa AnApeVkiSxka satayx, EkeMdare adu yAvAgalU iruvudeV Agide.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tacacx satayxM divxvidhamf |\\
ApeVkiSxkamanApeVkiSxkaM ceVti |\\
maqdAdisavxrUpamApeVkiSxkaM satayxmf |\\
parxlayakAleV tasAyxpayxBAvAtf |\\
barxhamxsavxrUpamanApeVkiSxkamf |\\
tasayx sadA satAvxtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, pu. 211)}
\newmeaning{\artha{nitayx, neYmititxka, kAmayx, nitayxneYmititxka, nitayxkAmayx eMdu sadAcAravu aidu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sadAcAraH bahuvidhAH parxmANeYrupavaNiRtAH |\\
saMkeSxVpataH paMcavidhA AcArAH niviRsheVSakAH ||\\
nitayxM neYmititxkaM kAmayxM nitayxneYmititxkaM tathA |\\
nitayxkAmayxmiti pArxhuH paMcadhA shAsatxrXkoVvidaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-2, 5. 9-10)}
\newmeaning{\artha{barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx,, nirABAri eMdu sahaja jaMgama mUru vidha. I mUvaru utatxroVtatxravAgi sherxVSaThxru. avaranunx vidhivatAtxgi pUjisabeVku.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceYva nirABAriVti teV tarxyaH ||\\
yathoVtatxraM vishiSayxMteV pUjaniVyA yathAvidhi |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 4. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{I diVkeSxyu sabiVja, abiVja (nibiRVja), cinamxya eMdu mUru vidha. I mUru BeVdagaLu karxmavAgi kamaR\-kAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDagaLalilx sapxSaTxvAgive.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sA diVkASx tirxdhA porxVkAtx sabiVjAbiVjacinamxyA |\\
yathAkarxmaM kamaRBakitxjAcnxnakAMDeVSu tAH suPxTAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 9. 7. 9)}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{BeVdaveMdare vayxtAyxsa athavA Binanxte eMbathaR alalxde, rahasayx, oLAthaR eMbathaRvU ide. (udA : adara BeVdavanariya ...iMtiV BeVdava tiLidu... 9:117)}

(savasaM. 2; alalxma. 98-31); sAva jiVva biMduvina saMca sAyada nAda pArxNada saMca sAva jiVvada, sAyada pArxNada eraDara BeVdavanariyadidaRDe... (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 722-203); enanx nAnariyadalilx... ayAyx enonxLage initiduR meYdoVrada BeVdava nimamxlilx kaMDe kANA... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 99-34).}}

\word{BeVdagaLu}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{AjAcnx, upamA, kalashABiSeVka, savxsitxkAroVhaNa, BUtipaTaTx,
Ayatatx matutx sAvxyatatx eMdu kirxyAdiVkeSxyu ELu vidhavAgide.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AjocnxVpamA ca kalasheYraBiSeVkasatxtaH paramf |\\
savxsitxkAroVhaNaM BUtipaTaTxmAyatatxmeVva ca |\\
sAvxyatatxmiti sapetxYtAH kirxyAdiVkASxMtarA matAH ||

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

 aneVka riVtiya kamaRgaLanunx mADi, avugaLa Palavanunx anuBavisalu
 matetx matetx huTiTx barutitxdAdxne, marujanamxdalilxyU adeV Barxme
 iruvudariMda, matetx punajaRnamxkekx agatayxvAda kamaRgaLanenxV
 mADutitxdAdxne. hiVge Bavacakarx\-dalilx naraLuvudu avanige

 guruvina baLi baMdu, liMgadiVkeSxya mUlaka AdhAyxtimxka jiVvana

 gaLike marugaLikeyeV horatu, hosa gaLikeyeVnalalx.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\quad AdhAyxtimxka sAdhaneya mUlaka gaLisikoMDa liMgAMga sAmarasayxvu

 sAdhaneya mUlaka jAcnxna paDedavanige marevu ilalx; marevu
 ilalxdavanige tananx nijasavxrUpa tiLidiruvudariMda avanige yAva

parashivanU nAnu aMganAgidedxVne eMba aBipArxyavanunx
taLeyabeVkAgutatxde. Adare parashiva saqSiTxsithxtilayagaLanunx
mADidaMte, shudAdhxtamx mADalAra; AdudariMda aMganaSeTxV tAnu
shivanalilx oMdAgi\-dedxVne eMdu tiLiyutAtxneyeV horatu, parashiva tAnu
aMganalilx oMdAgidedxVneMba BAva taLeyuvudilalx. sAmarasayx BAva
beVkAgiruvudu aMganige, liMgakakxlalx.}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{SaDaBxvavikAragaLU saha AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanada veYrigaLeV. avugaLu nashisada horatu mukitx sAdhayxvilalx. vacanakAraru avugaLanunx keDisuva upAyavanunx hiVge tiLisidAdxre: nAnu savxtaMtarx asitxtavxvanunx paDedidedxVne eMdu tiLiyade nAnu guruvina kaqpAgaBaRdalilxdedxVneMdu tiLidare, asitx eMba vikAra keDutatxde. nAnu mAyeya pariNAmadiMda huTiTxdedxVne eMdu BAvisade, nAnu gurukarasaMjAta eMdu BAvisidare, \hbox{jAyate} eMba vikAra keDutatxde. guruvu anugarxhisida sadABxvajAta liMgavanunx aMgadalilx dharisuva mUlaka taqpitxyanunx saMpAdisi, adariMda vipariNamateV eMba vikAra\-vanunx keDisa\-bahudu. guruvu toVrisikoTaTx AcAra matutx jAcnxnamAgaRdalilx naDedu AdhAyxtamxdalilx beLeyuva mUlaka vivadhaRte eMba vikAravanunx suDabahudu. deVheVMdirxyAdigaLelalx nananxvalalx, parashivanavu eMdu elalxvanUnx parashivanige apiRsuva mUlaka apakiSxVyate eMba vikAravanunx keDisa\-bahudu. maNiNxnalilx liVyavAguva badalu liMgAMga aikayxda mUlaka liMgadalilx liVyavAdare, vinashayxti eMba vikAravanunx keDisa\-bahudu. (noVDi. SaDABxva vikAra) (va.pa.koV. 377) (11.911); asitxjAyateV vipariNayateV vivadhaRteV apeVkiSxV\-yateV vinashayxti eMba SaDABxva vikAraMgaLu keDuvudakekx vivaraveMteMdakekx (savasaM. 11; savxtaMtarx. 457-911).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdha AcAraliMga}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{misharxSaDusathxla sidAdhxMtada parxkAra, parxtiyoMdu aMgasathxladalilxyU uLida aMgasathxlagaLu aDakavAgive. udAharaNege: Bakatxna Bakatx, Bakatxna maheVsha, Bakatxna parxsAdi, Bakatxna pArxNaliMgi, Bakatxna sharaNa matutx Bakatxna aikayx. hAgeyeV parxtiyoMdu aMgasathxladalilxyU uLida aMgasathxlagaLu aDakavAgive. AcAradalilx AcAraliMga, AcAradalilx guruliMga, AcAradalilx shivaliMga, AcAradalilx jaMgama\-liMga, AcAradalilx parxsAdaliMga, AcAradalilx mahAliMga. hiVgA\-dare Bakatxnu AcAraliMgavanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxvudeMdare, Aru liMgagaLanUnx sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxvudeMdathaR. hAge sAkASxtakxrisikoLaLxlu avanu Bakatxsathxladalilx naDedu\-koMDaMte naDedu\-koMDare sAladu, adara jotege uLida aidU sathxlagaLa sAdhakanaMte AcarisabeVkAgutatxde. adu heVgeMbudanunx SaDivxdha AcAraliMga parikalapxneyu tiLisutatxde. AcAra\-liMgada AcAraliMgavanunx taqpitxpaDisalu avanu paMcAcAra niratanAgabeVku. (noVDi. paMcAcAra), AcAraliMgadalilxna guruliMgavanunx olisikoLaLxlu sadA paMcAkaSxri maMtarxvanunx ucacxrisutitxrabeVku, AcAraliMgadalilxruva shivaliMgavanunx olisikoLaLxlu, pUjA samayadalilx tadeVka daqSiTxyiMda iSaTxliMgavanunx niriVkiSxsabeVku. AcAradalilxruva jaMgama\-liMgavanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLaLxlu, avanu yajacnx (dAsoVha) mADabeVku. aSaTxvidhAcaRne matutx SoVDashoVpacAragaLanUnx mADabeVku. (noVDi. dAsoVha, aSaTxvidhA\-caRne, SoVDashoVpacAra), AcAraliMgadalilxna parxsAdaliMgavanunx taqpitxpaDisalu parashivananunx kuritu yAvAgalU sotxVtarx mADabeVku; AcAraliMgadoLagina mahAliMgavanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLaLxlu, mahAliMgavanunx veVdhisi, tAnu adaralilx aikayxvAgabeVku. hiVge SaDivxdha AcAraliMgavu kirxye, maMtarx, niriVkaSxNe, yajana, Ishana, (sotxVtarx) matutx veVdhA eMba Aru kirxyegaLanunx oLagoMDide. (va.pa.koV. 379)}
\ullekha{SaDivxdha AcAra\-liMga -ivu kirxye, maMtarx, niriVkaSxNa, yajana, ILana, veVdhA eMdirutatxve. AcAraliMgada Aru vidhada parxgatigaLu ililx heVLalapxTiTxve (shivAkoV. 61-70).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdha AcAraliMga - SaDivxdhAcAraliMgaM - SaDivxdhaM ca tatf AcAraliMgaM ca  SaDivxdhAcAraliMgaM}}
\end{entry}

\artha{pariNAmoVdaka: liMgakekx taqpitxyAyiteMba Bakatxna mAnasika pariNAmaveV pariNAmoVdaka;}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdha liMgadhAraNe}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{namamx jAcnxneVMdirxya matutx kameRVMdirxyagaLu shakitxya vividha rUpAMtaragaLu. parxti\-yoMdu iMdirxyadalilxyU oMdoMdu liMgavidudx, A liMgagaLU saha parashivana vividha avataraNikegaLAgive. shakitxya vividha rUpAMtaragaLalilxruva liMgada vividha avataraNikegaLanunx sAdhakanu vividha haMtagaLalilx olisikoLuLxtAtxne. idanenxV vacanakAraru SaDivxdha liMgadhAraNe eMdu karedidAdxre. yAva haMtadalilx yAva liMgavanunx olisikoLaLxbeVkeMbudakekx vivara.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{paqthivxtatatxvXvu GArxNeVMdirxya matutx gudagaLAgi vikasitagoMDide. alilx nivaqtitxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide. A kaleyalilx kirxyAshakitxyutavAda AcAraliMgavidudx, sAdhakanu adanunx Bakatxsathxladalilx dharisi, BakatxnenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{jihevx matutx guhayx apf tatatxvXda vikasita rUpagaLu. alilx parxtiSATxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx jAcnxna shakitxyutavAda guruliMga idudx, adanunx dharisida sAdhakanu maheVshanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{neVtarx matutx pAdagaLu aginxtatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avugaLalilx vidAyxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx icACxshakitxyutavAda shiva\-liMga idudx, adanunx dharisidavanu parxsAdiyenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{tavxkukx matutx pANigaLu vAyu tatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avugaLalilx shAMtikalA eMba Bakitxyide. adaralilx AdishakitxyutavAda jaMgamaliMgavidudx adanunx dharisidavanu pArxNaliMgi enisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shorxVtarx matutx vAgiMdirxyagaLu parAshakitxya beVre rUpagaLu. avugaLalilx shAMtayxtiVta kaleyeMba Bakitxyidudx, adaralilx parAshakitxyutavAda parxsAdaliMgavidudx, adanunx dharisikoMDAta sharaNanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{Atamx eMba aMgakekx manasesxMba cicaCxkitxrUpada shakitx\-yidudx, adaroLage shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra kale eMba Bakitx ide, adaralilxruva cicaCxkitxyutavAda mahAliMgavanunx dharisidavanu aikayx.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{meVle heVLida Aru liMgagaLu manuSayxna karaNeVMdirxyagaLalilx AgaleV ive. avanunx hosadAgi avanu iSaTxliMgadaMte dharisa\-beVkAgilalx. avanalilx iruva shakitxgaLeV A liMgagaLanunx \hbox{mucicxve}. sAdhakanu kalegaLeMba BakitxgaLa sahAyadiMda, A shakitxgaLanunx pAradashaRka mADi, avugaLalilxruva liMgavanunx noVDidare, liMgadhAraNe mADidaMte. shakitxgaLanunx pAradashaRka mADuvudeMdare, avugaLa duguRNagaLanunx tegedu, avugaLa duvaRtaRneyanunx taDedu, avugaLanunx AdhAyxtimxka udedxVshakAkxgi baLasi\-koLuLxvudu (va.pa.koV. 381).}
\ullekha{SaDasathxla Bakatxru \hbox{SaDivxdha} liMgava dharisi nirALaliMgAcaRneya mADutitxharu. (savasaM. 11; savxtaMtarx 856-435)}}
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdha liMgadhAraNe - SaDivxdhaliMgadhAraNaM - SaDivxdhaM ca tatatf liMgadhAraNaM ca - SaDivxdhaliMgadhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}
